Greenville.Greenville Downtown Airport:
Greenville Downtown Airport (IATA: GMU, ICAO: KGMU, FAA LID: GMU) is three miles east of Greenville, in Greenville County, South Carolina. It is owned by the Greenville Airport Commission and is the busiest general aviation airport in South Carolina.
The National Plan of Integrated Airport Systems for 2011–2015 categorized it as a general aviation facility.
